verses.verse: Thou shalt <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H7200>see<s%> <S%H853><s%> thy <S%H251>brother's<s%> <S%H7794>ox<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> <S%H853><s%> his <S%H7716>sheep<s%> go <S%H5080>astray,<s%> and hide <S%H5956>thyself<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> them: thou shalt in any case bring them <S%H7725>again<s%> <S%H7725><s%> unto thy <S%H251>brother.<s%>

And <S%H518>if<s%> thy <S%H251>brother<s%> be <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H7138>nigh<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> thee, or if thou <S%H3045>know<s%> him <S%H3808>not,<s%> then thou shalt <S%H622>bring<s%> it <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H8432><s%> thine own <S%H1004>house,<s%> and it shall <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H5973>with<s%> thee <S%H5704>until<s%> thy <S%H251>brother<s%> seek <S%H1875>after<s%> it, and thou shalt <S%H7725>restore<s%> it to him again.

In like <S%H3651>manner<s%> shalt thou <S%H6213>do<s%> with his <S%H2543>ass;<s%> and <S%H3651>so<s%> shalt thou <S%H6213>do<s%> with his <S%H8071>raiment;<s%> and with <S%H3605>all<s%> lost <S%H9>thing<s%> of thy <S%H251>brother's,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> he hath <S%H6>lost,<s%> and thou hast <S%H4672>found,<s%> shalt thou <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H3651>likewise:<s%> thou <S%H3201>mayest<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> hide <S%H5956>thyself.<s%>

Thou shalt <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H7200>see<s%> <S%H853><s%> thy <S%H251>brother's<s%> <S%H2543>ass<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> his <S%H7794>ox<s%> fall <S%H5307>down<s%> by the <S%H1870>way,<s%> and hide <S%H5956>thyself<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> them: thou shalt surely help him to lift them up <S%H6965>again.<s%> <S%H6965><s%> <S%H5973><s%>

The <S%H802>woman<s%> shall <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H1961>wear<s%> that which <S%H3627>pertaineth<s%> unto a <S%H1397>man,<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> shall a <S%H1397>man<s%> put <S%H3847>on<s%> a <S%H802>woman's<s%> <S%H8071>garment:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> that <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H428>so<s%> are <S%H8441>abomination<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God.<s%>

If <S%H3588><s%> a <S%H6833>bird's<s%> <S%H7064>nest<s%> chance to <S%H7122>be<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> thee in the <S%H1870>way<s%> in <S%H3605>any<s%> <S%H6086>tree,<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> <S%H5921>on<s%> the <S%H776>ground,<s%> whether they be young <S%H667>ones,<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> <S%H1000>eggs,<s%> and the <S%H517>dam<s%> <S%H7257>sitting<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> the <S%H667>young,<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> the <S%H1000>eggs,<s%> thou shalt <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H3947>take<s%> the <S%H517>dam<s%> <S%H5921>with<s%> the young: <S%H1121><s%>

But thou shalt in any <S%H7971>wise<s%> <S%H853><s%> let the <S%H517>dam<s%> <S%H7971>go,<s%> and <S%H3947>take<s%> the <S%H1121>young<s%> to thee; <S%H4616>that<s%> it may be <S%H3190>well<s%> with thee, and that thou mayest <S%H748>prolong<s%> thy <S%H3117>days.<s%>

When <S%H3588><s%> thou <S%H1129>buildest<s%> a <S%H2319>new<s%> <S%H1004>house,<s%> then thou shalt <S%H6213>make<s%> a <S%H4624>battlement<s%> for thy <S%H1406>roof,<s%> that thou <S%H7760>bring<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H1818>blood<s%> upon thine <S%H1004>house,<s%> <S%H3588>if<s%> any <S%H5307>man<s%> <S%H5307>fall<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> thence.

Thou shalt <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H2232>sow<s%> thy <S%H3754>vineyard<s%> with divers <S%H3610>seeds:<s%> <S%H6435>lest<s%> the <S%H4395>fruit<s%> of thy <S%H2233>seed<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> thou hast <S%H2232>sown,<s%> and the <S%H8393>fruit<s%> of thy <S%H3754>vineyard,<s%> be <S%H6942>defiled.<s%>
Thou shalt <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H2790>plow<s%> with an <S%H7794>ox<s%> and an <S%H2543>ass<s%> <S%H3162>together.<s%>
Thou shalt <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H3847>wear<s%> a garment of divers <S%H8162>sorts,<s%> as of <S%H6785>woolen<s%> and <S%H6593>linen<s%> <S%H3162>together.<s%>

Thou shalt <S%H6213>make<s%> thee <S%H1434>fringes<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> the <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H3671>quarters<s%> of thy <S%H3682>vesture,<s%> <S%H834>wherewith<s%> thou <S%H3680>coverest<s%> thyself.
If <S%H3588><s%> any <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H3947>take<s%> a <S%H802>wife,<s%> and go <S%H935>in<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> her, and <S%H8130>hate<s%> her,

And <S%H7760>give<s%> <S%H5949>occasions<s%> of <S%H1697>speech<s%> against her, and bring <S%H3318>up<s%> an <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H8034>name<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> her, and <S%H559>say,<s%> I <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H2063>this<s%> <S%H802>woman,<s%> and when I <S%H7126>came<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> her, I <S%H4672>found<s%> her <S%H3808>not<s%> a maid: <S%H1331><s%>

Then shall the <S%H1>father<s%> of the <S%H5291>damsel,<s%> and her <S%H517>mother,<s%> <S%H3947>take<s%> and bring <S%H3318>forth<s%> <S%H853><s%> the tokens of the <S%H5291>damsel's<s%> <S%H1331>virginity<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of the <S%H5892>city<s%> in the gate: <S%H8179><s%>

And the <S%H5291>damsel's<s%> <S%H1>father<s%> shall <S%H559>say<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H2205>elders,<s%> I <S%H5414>gave<s%> <S%H853><s%> my <S%H1323>daughter<s%> unto <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> to <S%H802>wife,<s%> and he <S%H8130>hateth<s%> her;

And, <S%H2009>lo,<s%> <S%H1931>he<s%> hath <S%H7760>given<s%> <S%H5949>occasions<s%> of <S%H1697>speech<s%> against her, <S%H559>saying,<s%> I <S%H4672>found<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> thy <S%H1323>daughter<s%> a <S%H1331>maid;<s%> and yet <S%H428>these<s%> are the tokens of my <S%H1323>daughter's<s%> <S%H1331>virginity.<s%> And they shall <S%H6566>spread<s%> the <S%H8071>cloth<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of the <S%H5892>city.<s%>
And the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of <S%H1931>that<s%> <S%H5892>city<s%> shall <S%H3947>take<s%> <S%H853><s%> that <S%H376>man<s%> and <S%H3256>chastise<s%> him;

And they shall <S%H6064>amerce<s%> him in a <S%H3967>hundred<s%> shekels of <S%H3701>silver,<s%> and <S%H5414>give<s%> them unto the <S%H1>father<s%> of the <S%H5291>damsel,<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> he hath brought <S%H3318>up<s%> an <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H8034>name<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> a <S%H1330>virgin<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel:<s%> and she shall <S%H1961>be<s%> his <S%H802>wife;<s%> he <S%H3201>may<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> put her <S%H7971>away<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H3117>days.<s%>
But <S%H518>if<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H1697>thing<s%> <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H571>true,<s%> and the tokens of <S%H1331>virginity<s%> be <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H4672>found<s%> for the damsel: <S%H5291><s%>

Then they shall bring <S%H3318>out<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H5291>damsel<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> the <S%H6607>door<s%> of her <S%H1>father's<s%> <S%H1004>house,<s%> and the <S%H376>men<s%> of her <S%H5892>city<s%> shall <S%H5619>stone<s%> her with <S%H68>stones<s%> that she <S%H4191>die:<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> she hath <S%H6213>wrought<s%> <S%H5039>folly<s%> in <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> to play the <S%H2181>whore<s%> in her <S%H1>father's<s%> <S%H1004>house:<s%> so shalt thou put evil <S%H1197>away<s%> <S%H7451><s%> from <S%H4480>among<s%> <S%H7130><s%> you.

If <S%H3588><s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> be <S%H4672>found<s%> <S%H7901>lying<s%> <S%H5973>with<s%> a <S%H802>woman<s%> <S%H1166>married<s%> to a <S%H1167>husband,<s%> then they shall <S%H1571>both<s%> <S%H8147><s%> of them <S%H4191>die,<s%> both the <S%H376>man<s%> that <S%H7901>lay<s%> <S%H5973>with<s%> the <S%H802>woman,<s%> and the <S%H802>woman:<s%> so shalt thou put <S%H1197>away<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%> from <S%H4480>Israel.<s%> <S%H3478><s%>

If <S%H3588><s%> a <S%H5291>damsel<s%> that is a <S%H1330>virgin<s%> <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H781>betrothed<s%> unto a <S%H376>husband,<s%> and a <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H4672>find<s%> her in the <S%H5892>city,<s%> and <S%H7901>lie<s%> <S%H5973>with<s%> her;

Then ye shall bring them both <S%H3318>out<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H8147><s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H8179>gate<s%> of <S%H1931>that<s%> <S%H5892>city,<s%> and ye shall <S%H5619>stone<s%> them with <S%H68>stones<s%> that they <S%H4191>die;<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H5291>damsel,<s%> <S%H5921>because<s%> <S%H1697><s%> <S%H834><s%> she <S%H6817>cried<s%> <S%H3808>not,<s%> being in the <S%H5892>city;<s%> and the <S%H376>man,<s%> <S%H5921>because<s%> <S%H1697><s%> <S%H834><s%> he hath <S%H6031>humbled<s%> <S%H853><s%> his <S%H7453>neighbor's<s%> <S%H802>wife:<s%> so thou shalt put <S%H1197>away<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%> from <S%H4480>among<s%> <S%H7130><s%> you.

But <S%H518>if<s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H4672>find<s%> <S%H853><s%> a <S%H781>betrothed<s%> <S%H5291>damsel<s%> in the <S%H7704>field,<s%> and the <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H2388>force<s%> her, and <S%H7901>lie<s%> <S%H5973>with<s%> her: then the <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H905>only<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> <S%H7901>lay<s%> <S%H5973>with<s%> her shall die: <S%H4191><s%>

But unto the <S%H5291>damsel<s%> thou shalt <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H3808>nothing;<s%> <S%H1697><s%> there is in the <S%H5291>damsel<s%> <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H2399>sin<s%> worthy of <S%H4194>death:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> <S%H834>as<s%> when a <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H6965>riseth<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> his <S%H7453>neighbor,<s%> and <S%H7523>slayeth<s%> <S%H5315><s%> him, even <S%H3651>so<s%> is <S%H2088>this<s%> matter: <S%H1697><s%>
For <S%H3588><s%> he <S%H4672>found<s%> her in the <S%H7704>field,<s%> and the <S%H781>betrothed<s%> <S%H5291>damsel<s%> <S%H6817>cried,<s%> and there was <S%H369>none<s%> to <S%H3467>save<s%> her.

If <S%H3588><s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H4672>find<s%> a <S%H5291>damsel<s%> that is a <S%H1330>virgin,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> is <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H781>betrothed,<s%> and lay <S%H8610>hold<s%> on her, and <S%H7901>lie<s%> <S%H5973>with<s%> her, and they be <S%H4672>found;<s%>

Then the <S%H376>man<s%> that <S%H7901>lay<s%> <S%H5973>with<s%> her shall <S%H5414>give<s%> unto the <S%H5291>damsel's<s%> <S%H1>father<s%> <S%H2572>fifty<s%> shekels of <S%H3701>silver,<s%> and she shall <S%H1961>be<s%> his <S%H802>wife;<s%> <S%H8478>because<s%> <S%H834><s%> he hath <S%H6031>humbled<s%> her, he <S%H3201>may<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> put her <S%H7971>away<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H3117>days.<s%>
A <S%H376>man<s%> shall <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H3947>take<s%> <S%H853><s%> his <S%H1>father's<s%> <S%H802>wife,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H1540>discover<s%> his <S%H1>father's<s%> <S%H3671>skirt.<s%>
